document_data.name: Lady Hawklin
document_data.mainbody: '''Lady Hawklin''' was a young member of the [[Hawklin]] family in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1356}}, she was part of a revel in which other guests included [[Andemel Graeven]] and [[Sabrart Windrider]]. They observed that she had failed to hold her [[wine]], and had to be carried away by servants. Her dressing gown was stained with the red of the wine she had drunk at the time.
